name: PowerBank (PhilDev)
description:
A survival game about resource management!

This game was made in a week for the blackthornprod game jam.

Developer - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvqu8XVwCLHFOlJdP2SgKmg

Controls -

WASD / ArrowKeys - movement

E - shop

ESC - pause

Left click - attack
